name: Vol'Talkes - The AI War
description: SciFi RTS Space Combat game with a HUGE focus on the storyline in an open world (galaxy) gameplay mode. 4 different career paths, chosen by your actions during the story, force you to rethink your tactics and develop new strategies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core processors Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia 7800+ or ATI Radeon 9600+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c kompatible PCI, USB, oder Onboard-Soundkarte
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel or AMD Quad Core processors Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 670 or ATI Radeon DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c kompatible PCI, USB, oder Onboard-Soundkarte
